name: poc-gherkin-testcafe
description: A proof of concept testing the coupling between Gherkin-TestCaf√© and Allure.

scripts.test:command: npx gherkin-testcafe firefox tests/steps/*.ts tests/steps/*.js tests/features/*.feature --reporter allure
scripts.test:command:generate: npx gherkin-testcafe firefox tests/steps/*.ts tests/steps/*.js tests/features/*.feature --reporter allure && allure generate allure/allure-results --clean -o allure/allure-report && allure open allure/allure-report
scripts.test:runner:generate: node tests/runner.js && allure generate allure/allure-results --clean -o allure/allure-report && allure open allure/allure-report

author: Ronald van den Broek
